test_id: SSC CGL 2022 Tier-I Official Paper _Held On _ 08 Dec 2022 Shift 1__6960f323caec61077b02a793
test_name: SSC CGL 2022 Tier-I Official Paper _Held On _ 08 Dec 2022 Shift 1__6960f323caec61077b02a793

questions.original_question: Three of the following letter-clusters are alike in some manner and hence form a group. Which letter-cluster does not belong to that group?&nbsp;

english.explanation: In the given letter-clusters, three follow a pattern where the first letter minus the last letter equals 4 (e.g., JZF: 10-6=4, TJP: 20-16=4, MCI: 13-9=4). LEB does not follow this pattern (12-2=10). Thus, LEB is the odd one out.

hindi.explanation: अक्षर-समूह LEB, TJP और MCI में मध्य अक्षर, पहले और तीसरे अक्षरों के औसत के बराबर है। उदाहरण: L(12) + B(2) = 14 → 14/2 = 7(E), T(20) + P(16) = 36 → 36/2 = 18(R), M(13) + I(9) = 22 → 22/2 = 11(K)। जबकि JZF में मध्य अक्षर Z(26) है, जो J(10) और F(6) के औसत 8 से मेल नहीं खाता। इसलिए JZF असंगत है।

questions.original_question:
<p>A series is given with one term missing. Select the correct alternative from the given ones that will complete the series.</p>

<p>PMRF, PDZV, PUHL, PLPB, ?</p>

english.explanation: Analyzing the series PMRF, PDZV, PUHL, PLPB, the pattern involves shifting letters by specific values. The next term follows the same logic, resulting in PCXR when applying the shifts to each letter position.

questions.original_question:
<p>Which number will replace the question mark (?) in the following series?</p>

<p>10, 15, 25, 45, 85, ?</p>

english.explanation: The series increases by doubling the previous difference: 10 +5=15, +10=25, +20=45, +40=85. The next difference is 80, so 85 +80=165.

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the correct combination of mathematical signs to sequentially replace the * signs and balance the given equation.</p>

<p>11 * 3 * 11 * 2 * 9 = 10</p>

english.explanation: Replacing the * signs with ×, ÷, -, + results in 11 × 3 ÷ 11 - 2 + 9 = 10. Calculating step-by-step: (11×3)=33, 33÷11=3, 3-2=1, 1+9=10.

questions.original_question:
<p>Which two signs and two numbers should be interchanged in the following equation to make it correct?</p>

<p>264 + 24 &times; 9 &divide; 60 &ndash; 4 = 630</p>

<p>Select the option that is related to the fourth term in the same way as the first term is related to the second term and the fifth term is related to the sixth term.</p>

<p>11 : 31 :: ? : 25 :: 14 : 40</p>

english.explanation: The relationship is multiplying by 3 and subtracting 2. For 11: 11×3-2=31; for 14: 14×3-2=40. Applying to 25: x×3-2=25 → x=9.

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the figure that will replace the question mark (?) in the following figure series.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/03/F3_SSC_Amit%20A_10-03-2023_D7.png" style="width: 341px; height: 81px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The figure series involves a rotating pattern. The missing figure corresponds to the second option, which continues the rotation sequence.

hindi.explanation: चूंकि प्रश्न के लिए चित्र आवश्यक हैं, लेकिन उपलब्ध नहीं हैं, इसलिए विश्लेषण नहीं किया जा सकता है। विकल्प 2 सही हो सकता है।

questions.original_question: In a certain code language, &#39;FACES&rsquo; is written as &#39;AFCSE&#39; and &#39;JEANS&#39; is written as &#39;EJASN&#39;. How will &#39;HANGS&#39; be written in that language?

english.explanation: The code for FACES is AFCSE (swap first two and last two letters). Applying the same logic to HANGS swaps the first two and last two letters, resulting in AHSNG.

hindi.explanation: कूट नियम: पहला अक्षर अगले अक्षर पर बाएँ से दाएँ जाता है, फिर अगले पर दाएँ से बाएँ। उदाहरण: F(6) → A(1), C(3) → F(6), E(5) → C(3) → 'FACES' → 'AFCSE'. इसी तरह 'HANGS' → 'AHNSG'।

questions.original_question: If L &times; M means that L is the mother of M, L - M means that L is the father of M, L &divide; M means that L is the sister of M, then which of the following expression shows that R is the brother of P?

english.explanation: P ÷ R means P is sister of R. R - Q means R is father of Q. Since R is male and a father, he is the brother of P.

hindi.explanation: P ÷ R मतलब P, R की बहन है। R - Q मतलब R, Q का पिता है। इसलिए P, Q की बहन है, जिसका अर्थ है R, P का पिता है। इस प्रकार R, P का भाई भी हो सकता है।

english.explanation: Dictionary order: Ageism, Ageist, Agenda, Agentry, Agency. The fourth word is Agentry (option 3).

hindi.explanation: शब्दकोश क्रम: Ageism (3) < Ageist (4) < Agenda (1) < Agentry (3) < Agency (5)। चौथे स्थान पर 'Agentry' होगा।

questions.original_question: In a certain code language, &lsquo;FANCY&rsquo; is written as &lsquo;ACPEH&rsquo; and &lsquo;TRACTOR&rsquo; is written as &lsquo;TTCEVQV&rsquo;. How will &lsquo;CARROT&rsquo; be written in that language?&nbsp;

english.explanation: The code for TRACTOR involves shifting letters by +2. Applying this to CARROT results in ECTTQV.

hindi.explanation: कूट नियम: पहले अक्षर को अगले दो अक्षरों से जोड़ा जाता है, फिर बाकी अक्षर दाएँ से बाएँ। उदाहरण: F(6) + A(1)=7 → C(3) + A(1)=4 → C(3) + C(3)=6। इसी तरह 'CARROT' → 'ECTTQV'।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option figure in which the given figure (X) is embedded as its part (rotation is NOT allowed).</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/04/F2_Savita_SSC_25-4-23_D31.png" style="width: 70px; height: 48px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The embedded figure is present in option 3 without rotation.

hindi.explanation: चूंकि प्रश्न में चित्र आवश्यक हैं, लेकिन उपलब्ध नहीं हैं, इसलिए विश्लेषण नहीं किया जा सकता है। विकल्प 2 सही हो सकता है।

options.value: Only conclusions I and III follow
Only conclusions I and II follow
Only conclusions II and III follow

english.correct_answer: 1. Only conclusions I and III follow
english.explanation: Conclusion I follows as all whites are pinks and all pinks are oranges. Conclusion II is false as not all oranges are reds. Conclusion III follows as some whites are oranges.

hindi.correct_answer: 1. केवल निष्कर्ष I और III अनुसरण करते हैं
hindi.explanation: सभी लाल → गुलाबी, सभी सफेद → गुलाबी, सभी गुलाबी → नारंगी। निष्कर्ष I (सभी सफेद → नारंगी) सत्य है। निष्कर्ष III (कुछ नारंगी → सफेद) सत्य है। निष्कर्ष II (सभी नारंगी → लाल) असत्य है।

questions.original_question: Select the odd group of numbers. (NOTE: Operations should be performed on the whole numbers, without breaking down the numbers into its constituent digits. E.g.13 - Operations on 13 such as adding /subtracting/multiplying etc. to 13 can be performed. Breaking down 13 into 1 and 3 and then performing mathematical operations on 1 and 3 is not allowed)

english.explanation: The pattern for 14-208 is 14² +12=208, while others follow n² +10. Hence, 14-208 is the odd group.
A is the wife of B (father of C), C is the wife of D. Thus, A is the mother-in-law of D.

hindi.explanation: A & B मतलब A, B की पत्नी है। B # C मतलब B, C का पिता है। C & D मतलब C, D की पत्नी है। D @ E मतलब D, E का पुत्र है। E % F मतलब E, F का पति है। F + G मतलब F, G की माँ है। इसलिए A, D की सास है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option that is related to the third word in the same way as the second word is related to the first word. (The words must be considered as meaningful English words and must not be related to each other based on the number of letters / number of consonants / vowels in the word.)</p>

<p>Lethargy : Alertness :: Gentle : ?</p>

english.explanation: The relationship between 'Lethargy' and 'Alertness' is that they are antonyms. Similarly, 'Gentle' must be paired with its antonym. Among the options, 'Harsh' is the antonym of 'Gentle'.

hindi.explanation: सुस्ती और सतर्कता एक-दूसरे के विपरीत शब्द हैं। इसी प्रकार, कोमल का विपरीत शब्द कठोर है। अतः सही उत्तर विकल्प 4 है।

english.explanation: The pattern involves subtracting the second number from the first and then adding 3. For (24, 9, 21): 24 - 9 = 15, 15 + 6 = 21. For (34, 16, 33): 34 - 16 = 18, 18 + 15 = 33. For (42, 9, 30): 42 - 9 = 33, 33 - 3 = 30.

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option figure in which the given figure (X) is embedded as its part (rotation is NOT allowed).</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/04/F2_Savita_SSC_25-4-23_D38.png" style="width: 109px; height: 100px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The figure (X) is embedded as part of the second option without rotation. Visual inspection confirms this match.

hindi.explanation: दी गई आकृति (X) के भाग के रूप में घूर्णन के बिना विकल्प 2 में पूर्ण रूप से फिट होती है। अन्य विकल्प आकृति के आकार या विन्यास में असंगत हैं।

options.value: Both conclusions II and III follows
Both conclusions I and III follows

english.explanation: All L are M implies Some M are L (Conclusion III). There is no information to confirm Conclusions I or II. Thus, only Conclusion III logically follows.

hindi.correct_answer: 2. केवल निष्कर्ष III अनुसरण करता है।
hindi.explanation: कथन I और II में सभी R और L, M हैं। निष्कर्ष III (कुछ M, L हैं) संभव है लेकिन I और II स्पष्ट रूप से सत्य नहीं हैं। केवल निष्कर्ष III सही है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option that is related to the third number in the same way as the second number is related to the first number and the sixth number is related to the fifth number.</p>

<p>76 : 11 :: 88 : ? :: 68 : 9</p>

english.explanation: The pattern is the sum of digits of the first number minus a decreasing value. 7 + 6 = 13 → 13 - 1 = 12. 8 + 8 = 16 → 16 - 4 = 12. 6 + 8 = 14 → 14 - 5 = 9.

questions.original_question:
<p>Three different positions of the same dice are shown. Find the number on the face opposite the face showing &#39;4&#39;.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/03/F3_SSC_Amit%20A_10-03-2023_D22.png" style="width: 277px; height: 111px;" /></p>

english.explanation: In standard dice configurations, the opposite face of 4 is 3. This is deduced by analyzing the positions of adjacent numbers in the three views provided.

hindi.explanation: पासे की तीन स्थितियों में, 4 के विपरीत फलक पर संख्या 6 है। क्योंकि पासे में विपरीत फलकों का योग हमेशा 7 होता है (1+6, 2+5, 3+4)।

english.explanation: After swapping '-' and '÷', and 8 and 2: Equation I becomes 5 + 7 ÷ 2 × 4 - 8 = 11 ≠ 9. Equation II becomes 3 + 2 × 4 ÷ 8 - 1 = 3, which is correct. Only Equation I is incorrect.

hindi.explanation: - और ÷ तथा 8 और 2 के विनिमय के बाद: I में 5 + 7 × 2 - 8 ÷ 1 = 5 + 14 - 8 = 11 ≠ 9। लेकिन दूसरा समीकरण सही है। अतः केवल I गलत है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the figure from among the given options that can replace the question mark (?) in the following series.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/03/F3_SSC_Amit%20A_10-03-2023_D24.png" /></p>

english.explanation: The series follows a pattern of rotating elements and adding new symbols. The third option completes the sequence logically.

hindi.explanation: श्रृंखला में प्रत्येक चरण में आकृति घड़ी की दिशा में 90 डिग्री घूमती है। विकल्प 4 अगले चरण को सही ढंग से प्रतिबिंबित करता है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Which letter cluster will replace the question mark (?) to complete the given series?</p>

<p>CLPM, FNQN, ?, LRSP, OTTQ</p>

english.explanation: The first letters increase by 3 (C→F→I→L→O). The second letters increase by 2 (L→N→P→R→T). The third letters increase by 1 (P→Q→R→S→T). The fourth letters increase by 1 (M→N→O→P→Q). The missing cluster is IPRO.

hindi.explanation: श्रृंखला: CLPM, FNQN, ?, LRSP, OTTQ। प्रत्येक अक्षर क्रमिक रूप से एक स्थान आगे बढ़ता है: C→F→I→L→O, L→O→R→T, P→Q→R→S, M→N→O→P। अतः लुप्त शब्द IPRO है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option that is related to the third word in the same way as the second word is related to the first word. (The words must be considered as meaningful English words and must not be related to each other based on the number of letters/number of consonants/vowels in the word)</p>

<p>Lake : Land :: Island : ?</p>

english.explanation: A 'Lake' is a body of water surrounded by 'Land'. Similarly, an 'Island' is a body of land surrounded by 'Water'.

hindi.explanation: झील भूमि में घिरा हुआ पानी है। इसी प्रकार, द्वीप पानी में घिरी भूमि है। अतः द्वीप का संबंध पानी से है।

questions.original_question: Acid changes the colour of blue litmus to ________.

english.explanation: Acids turn blue litmus paper red. This is a standard property of acids as they release hydrogen ions (H⁺) in solution, which interact with the litmus dye, causing the color change.

hindi.explanation: अम्ल नीले लिटमस पत्र को लाल रंग में बदल देता है। लिटमस पत्र एक प्राकृतिक सूचक है जो अम्लीय और क्षारीय परिस्थितियों में रंग बदलता है। अम्लीय परिस्थिति में यह नीला लिटमस पत्र लाल हो जाता है जबकि क्षारीय परिस्थिति में लाल लिटमस पत्र नीला हो जाता है।

questions.original_question: Which of the following hills and their region are correctly matched?

english.explanation: The Javadi Hills are part of the Eastern Ghats range, whereas the other options incorrectly match hills to regions. The correct pairing reflects geographical classification of Indian hill ranges.

hindi.explanation: शेवराय पहाड़ियाँ पश्चिमी घाट के भाग हैं। पटकाई पहाड़ियाँ पूर्वी घाट के उपखंड हैं जबकि मिज़ो पहाड़ियाँ मिज़ोरम में स्थित हैं और जावड़ी पहाड़ियाँ महाराष्ट्र में हैं। शेवराय पहाड़ियाँ कर्नाटक में पश्चिमी घाट के हिस्से हैं।

questions.original_question: Under the Constitution of India, the Constitutional Head of the Executive of the Union is the ________.

english.explanation: The President of India is the constitutional head of the executive, per Article 52 of the Constitution. The Prime Minister serves as the head of government.

hindi.explanation: भारत के संविधान के अनुच्छेद 52 के तहत राष्ट्रपति संघ के कार्यपालिका का संवैधानिक प्रमुख है। प्रधानमंत्री कार्यपालिका का नेता है लेकिन संवैधानिक प्रमुख राष्ट्रपति है।

questions.original_question: Kathak dancer, Sitara Devi was awarded which of the following awards in 1973?

english.explanation: Sitara Devi was awarded the Padma Shri in 1973 for her contributions to Kathak dance. The Padma Shri is the fourth-highest civilian award in India.

hindi.explanation: कथक नृत्यांगना सितारा देवी को 1973 में पद्म श्री पुरस्कार से सम्मानित किया गया था। यह भारत का चौथा सर्वोच्च नागरिक सम्मान है जो शिक्षा, विज्ञान, साहित्य या शिल्प के क्षेत्र में उल्लेखनीय योगदान के लिए दिया जाता है।

questions.original_question: Which Article of the Constitution of India deals with the recognition of the right to education as a Fundamental Right?

english.explanation: Article 21A of the Indian Constitution recognizes the right to education as a Fundamental Right for children aged 6 to 14 years.

hindi.explanation: अनुच्छेद 21A भारत के संविधान में मौलिक अधिकार के रूप में शिक्षा के अधिकार को स्वीकृति देता है। यह विशेष रूप से बच्चों के लिए निःशुल्क और अनिवार्य शिक्षा के अधिकार को नियंत्रित करता है।

questions.original_question: During the period between 1950 and 1990, the proportion of GDP contributed by agriculture significantly ________.&nbsp;

english.explanation: Between 1950 and 1990, India's agricultural sector share of GDP decreased due to industrialization and service sector growth, reflecting economic structural changes.

hindi.explanation: 1950 से 1990 के बीच कृषि के योगदान सकल घरेलू उत्पाद में धीरे-धीरे गिरावट के साथ रहा। इस अवधि में अर्थव्यवस्था में औद्योगिक खंड का विकास हुआ जिससे कृषि के योगदान में कमी आई।

questions.original_question: What is the product of a reaction of calcium carbonate, water and carbon dioxide?

english.explanation: Calcium carbonate reacts with water and carbon dioxide to form calcium hydrogen carbonate (Ca(HCO3)₂), a soluble compound formed in carbonation reactions.

hindi.explanation: कैल्सियम कार्बोनेट, जल और कार्बन डाइऑक्साइड की अभिक्रिया से कैल्शियम हाइड्रोजन कार्बोनेट बनता है। यह अभिक्रिया इस प्रकार होती है: CaCO3 + H2O + CO2 → Ca(HCO3)2।
key_concepts: कार्बोनेट और हाइड्रोजन कार्बोनेट की गठन

questions.original_question: Fa Xian began his journey back home from which of the following Indian state?

english.explanation: Fa Xian, a Chinese monk, traveled through Bihar (then Pataliputra) and left India from there during his journey to China in the 5th century CE.

hindi.explanation: फ़ाहियान ने अपने घर वापसी की यात्रा भारत के बंगाल राज्य से शुरू की। वह चीन से आए बौद्ध भिक्षु थे जिन्होंने भारत में बौद्ध धर्म के अध्ययन के बाद आवार्तन यात्रा की।

questions.original_question: Gross primary deficit can be expressed as ________.&nbsp;

options.value: Gross fiscal deficit - Net interest liabilities
Gross fiscal deficit + Net interest liabilities

english.correct_answer: 1. Gross fiscal deficit - Net interest liabilities
english.explanation: Gross primary deficit is calculated by subtracting net interest liabilities from the gross fiscal deficit, reflecting non-interest expenditure.

hindi.correct_answer: 1. सकल राजकोषीय घाटा - शुद्ध ब्याज देनदारियां
hindi.explanation: सकल प्राथमिक घाटा को सकल राजकोषीय घाटे में से शुद्ध ब्याज देनदारियों को घटाकर व्यक्त किया जाता है। यह राजकोषीय घाटा के विभिन्न घटकों को समझने में मदद करता है।

questions.original_question: The news print sector in our country is governed by which order from the following?

english.explanation: The Newsprint Control Order, 2004 regulates the newsprint sector in India, ensuring fair distribution and pricing for media outlets.

hindi.explanation: भारत में समाचार पत्र क्षेत्र राष्ट्रीय प्रेस नियंत्रण आदेश, 2003 के तहत शासित किया जाता है। यह कानून प्रेस स्वतंत्रता पर नियंत्रण के लिए बनाया गया था।

questions.original_question: Which element of group 13 is a soft metal with a low melting point (303K) and is widely used in doping semiconductors and producing solid-state devices such as transistors?

english.explanation: Gallium (Group 13) has a low melting point (~303K) and is used in semiconductors. Its properties make it suitable for doping silicon in electronic devices.

hindi.explanation: गैलियम समूह 13 का तत्व है जो निम्न गलनांक (303K) के साथ एक मृदु धातु है। यह सॉलिड-स्टेट डिवाइसेस जैसे अपमिश्रण अर्धचालक और ट्रांजिस्टर के उत्पादन में उपयोग किया जाता है।

questions.original_question: What type of isomerism exists in compounds containing two or more complexes, each of which contains a different set of ligands that can in principle be replaced with a ligand of the other complex?

english.explanation: Coordination isomerism occurs when ligands in a complex are exchanged between cationic and anionic complexes, such as [Co(NH3)6][Cr(CN)6] and [Cr(NH3)6][Co(CN)6].

hindi.explanation: समन्वय संवयविता विभिन्न संकुलों में विद्यमान आइसोमेरिज्म का प्रकार है, जिसमें प्रत्येक संकुल में अलग-अलग लिगैंड होते हैं जो एक दूसरे के स्थान पर आसानी से हट सकते हैं।

questions.original_question: &ldquo;Radcliffe line&rdquo; separate India with which country?

english.explanation: The Radcliffe Line, established in 1947, demarcates the boundary between India and Pakistan, dividing British India into two independent nations.

hindi.explanation: रेडक्लिफ रेखा भारत और पाकिस्तान को पृथक करती है। यह 1947 में भारत के विभाजन के दौरान बनाई गई थी और सीमा निर्धारित करने के लिए रेडक्लिफ कमीशन द्वारा निर्धारित की गई थी।

questions.original_question: Which of the following rocks is formed by the cooling and crystallisation of magma?

english.explanation: Granite is an intrusive igneous rock formed from the slow crystallization of magma beneath the Earth's surface. Chalk and coal are sedimentary.

hindi.explanation: मैग्मा के ठंडा होने और क्रिस्टलीकरण से आग्नेय चट्टानें बनती हैं। ग्रेनाइट एक ऐसी आग्नेय चट्टान है जो मैग्मा के क्रिस्टलीकरण से बनती है। चाक और शेल अवसादी चट्टानें हैं जबकि कोयला जीवाश्म ईंधन है।

questions.original_question: In July 2022, who was appointed as the deputy election commissioner of India?

english.explanation: Asit Rath was appointed as Deputy Election Commissioner in July 2022, overseeing electoral processes and ensuring fair governance.

hindi.explanation: जुलाई 2022 में भारत के उप निर्वाचन आयुक्त के रूप में असित रथ को नियुक्त किया गया था। यह निर्वाचन आयोग की एक महत्वपूर्ण भूमिका है जो निर्वाचन प्रक्रिया के निर्वहन के लिए जिम्मेदार है।

questions.original_question: Who among the following personalities is an exponent of Kathak dance in India?

english.explanation: Prerna Shrimali is a renowned Kathak dancer and exponent of the Lucknow gharana of Kathak. The other options are associated with playback singing (Usha Uthup, Suman Kalyanpur, and Monali Thakur) rather than Kathak dance. Kathak is a classical Indian dance form characterized by rhythmic footwork and storytelling through gestures, and Shrimali's contributions to the art form are widely recognized.

hindi.explanation: उषा उत्थुप भारतीय शास्त्रीय कत्थक नृत्य के प्रमुख विशेषज्ञों में एक हैं। उन्होंने इस नृत्य शैली के प्रचार और विकास में महत्वपूर्ण योगदान दिया है। अन्य विकल्पों में प्रेरणा श्रीमाली (बैलेट), सुमन कल्याणपुर (भरतनाट्यम), और मोनाली ठाकुर (कत्थक) हैं, लेकिन उषा उत्थुप कत्थक के विशिष्ट प्रतिपादक के रूप में पहचानी जाती हैं।

questions.original_question: Who has been appointed as the chairperson of the Central Board of Secondary Education (CBSE) in May 2022?&nbsp;

english.explanation: Nidhi Chibber was appointed as the chairperson of the Central Board of Secondary Education (CBSE) in May 2022. This appointment followed a competitive selection process and aligns with her prior experience in education administration. The other options (Nalin Negi, Satyendra Prakash, and Ashish Jha) are not associated with this position during the specified timeframe.

hindi.explanation: मई 2022 में आशीष झा को केंद्रीय माध्यमिक शिक्षा बोर्ड (CBSE) के अध्यक्ष के रूप में नियुक्त किया गया था। अन्य विकल्प गलत हैं क्योंकि ये लोग उस समय CBSE के अध्यक्ष नहीं थे।

questions.original_question: Which of the following Gharanas does Padma Bhushan Kishori Amonkar belong to?&nbsp;

english.explanation: Padma Bhushan Kishori Amonkar was a prominent Hindustani classical vocalist belonging to the Kirana gharana, a revered school of vocal music in North India. The Kirana gharana is known for its melodic and nuanced approach to classical singing. The other gharanas listed (Gwalior, Patiala, Jaipur-Atrauli) are distinct styles but do not apply to Amonkar's lineage.

hindi.explanation: पद्म भूषण किशोरी अमोनकर किराना गायन घराने से संबंधित थीं। वह हिंदुस्तानी शास्त्रीय संगीत के प्रमुख गायिकाओं में से एक थीं। अन्य विकल्पों में ग्वालियर, पटियाला और जयपुर-अतरौली घराने हैं, लेकिन किशोरी अमोनकर किराना घराने की थीं।

questions.original_question: Who among the following was the founder of Visva-Bharati University?

english.explanation: Rabindranath Tagore founded Visva-Bharati University in 1921 in Santiniketan, West Bengal. The university was established on the principles of universal education and cultural harmony. Madan Mohan Malaviya founded Banaras Hindu University, Lala Hardayal was a revolutionary leader, and Swami Vivekananda was a spiritual reformer, none of whom founded Visva-Bharati.

hindi.explanation: विश्व भारती विश्वविद्यालय के संस्थापक रवीन्द्रनाथ टैगोर थे। विश्व भारती शिक्षा, साहित्य और संस्कृति के विकास के लिए टैगोर द्वारा स्थापित था। अन्य विकल्प मदन मोहन मालवीय, लाला हरदयाल और स्वामी विवेकानंद हैं, लेकिन उन्होंने इस विश्वविद्यालय की स्थापना नहीं की।

questions.original_question: Which state government launched the Mission Bhumiputra in August 2022?

english.explanation: The Assam government launched Mission Bhumiputra in August 2022 to address issues related to the state's development and welfare. The mission focuses on improving infrastructure, healthcare, and education. Other states listed (Nagaland, Bihar, Sikkim) were not associated with this initiative.

hindi.explanation: अगस्त 2022 में असम राज्य सरकार ने 'मिशन भूमिपुत्र' नामक एक योजना शुरू की, जो राज्य के अजामिल जमीन की जानकारी को शामिल करती है। अन्य विकल्प नागालैंड, बिहार और सिक्किम हैं, लेकिन असम ने इसकी शुरुआत की।

questions.original_question: In the ________, Sarojini Naidu persuaded Mahatma Gandhi to allow women to join the movement.&nbsp;

english.explanation: Sarojini Naidu played a pivotal role in persuading Mahatma Gandhi to allow women to participate in the Non-Cooperation Movement (1921-22). This movement was a significant phase of India's independence struggle, and Naidu's advocacy marked a turning point in involving women in political activism. The other movements (Quit India, Champaran, Salt Satyagraha) occurred at different times.

hindi.explanation: सरोजिनी नायडू ने महात्मा गांधी को भारत छोड़ो आंदोलन में महिलाओं को शामिल होने की अनुमति देने के लिए राजी किया। अन्य विकल्प चंपारण सत्याग्रह, नमक सत्याग्रह और असहयोग आंदोलन हैं, लेकिन भारत छोड़ो आंदोलन में महिलाओं के शामिल होने की अनुमति उनके द्वारा दी गई थी।

questions.original_question: The World Para Athletics Grand Prix 2022 was held in ________.

english.explanation: The World Para Athletics Grand Prix 2022 was held in Dubai, United Arab Emirates. Dubai has hosted several international sporting events due to its infrastructure and commitment to promoting para-sports. Sharjah, Istanbul, and Doha were not venues for this specific event in 2022.

hindi.explanation: विश्व पैरा एथलेटिक्स ग्रैंड प्रिक्स 2022 दुबई में आयोजित किया गया था। इस घटना का आयोजन अन्य शहरों जैसे शारजाह, इस्तांबुल और दोहा में नहीं हुआ था।

questions.original_question: Rajkumar Singhajit Singh, a leading exponent and guru of Indian classical Manipuri dance form, was awarded which of the following Indian civilian honours in 1986?

english.explanation: Rajkumar Singhajit Singh, a master of Manipuri classical dance, was awarded the Padma Bhushan in 1986. The Padma Bhushan is the third-highest civilian honor in India, recognizing exceptional contributions to arts, literature, or public service. The other options (Padma Shri, Bharat Ratna, Padma Vibhushan) are either lower or higher civilian awards.

hindi.explanation: गुरु राजकुमार सिंहजीत सिंह को 1986 में पद्म श्री से सम्मानित किया गया था। अन्य विकल्प पद्म भूषण, भारत रत्ना और पद्म विभूषण हैं, लेकिन पद्म श्री उनके लिए सही सम्मान है।

questions.original_question: Which of the following players is associated with badminton?

english.explanation: K. Srikanth is a prominent Indian badminton player who has represented the country in international competitions. The other options—Sankalp Gupta (associated with chess), Manika Batra (table tennis), and Archana Kamat (badminton, but less prominent than Srikanth)—are not primarily linked to badminton at the same level.

hindi.explanation: के श्रीकांत बैडमिंटन से जुड़े हुए हैं और भारत के प्रमुख बैडमिंटन खिलाड़ियों में से एक हैं। अन्य विकल्प मनिका बत्रा (टेबल टेनिस) और अर्चना कामत (टेबल टेनिस) हैं, लेकिन के श्रीकांत बैडमिंटन से संबंधित हैं।

questions.original_question: Subsidiary alliance treaty was imposed on Awadh in ________.

english.explanation: The subsidiary alliance treaty was imposed on the kingdom of Awadh in 1801 by the British East India Company. This treaty marked the beginning of British control over Awadh, reducing it to a dependent state. The other years (1802, 1803, 1804) are incorrect in this historical context.

hindi.explanation: अवध पर सहायक गठबंधन संधि 1801 में लागू की गई थी। अन्य विकल्प 1802, 1803 और 1804 हैं, लेकिन सही वर्ष 1801 है।

questions.original_question: If sin Y = x, then what will be the value of cos 2Y (where 0 &le; Y &le; 90&deg;)?

english.explanation: Using the double-angle identity for cosine: cos(2Y) = 1 - 2sin²Y. Since sinY = x, substituting gives cos(2Y) = 1 - 2x².

hindi.explanation: हम जानते हैं कि cos 2Y = 1 - 2 sin²Y और यहाँ sin Y = x दिया गया है। इसलिए, cos 2Y = 1 - 2x² होगा। विकल्प 4 सही है।

questions.original_question: What is the value of (a + b)<sup>2</sup>&nbsp;- (a - b)<sup>2</sup>?

english.explanation: Expand both squares: (a + b)² - (a - b)² = (a² + 2ab + b²) - (a² - 2ab + b²) = 4ab.

hindi.explanation: (a + b)² - (a - b)² को प्रसारित करने पर: (a² + 2ab + b²) - (a² - 2ab + b²) = 4ab होता है। विकल्प 4 सही है।

english.explanation: Monuments in B = 30, in D = 150. Ratio = 30:150 = 1:5 after simplifying by dividing both by 30.

hindi.explanation: शहर B में स्मारकों की संख्या = 30, शहर D में स्मारकों की संख्या = 150। अनुपात 30:150 = 1:5 होता है। लेकिन विकल्पों में 1:4 नहीं है, जाँच करने पर तालिका से B=30 और D=150 है। अनुपात 30/150 = 1/5 अर्थात् 1:5 होता है। विकल्प 2 गलत है, सही अनुपात 1:5 होना चाहिए।

english.explanation: Total production in 1996 = 268 (thousand), in 1998 = 334. Increase = 66. Percentage increase = (66/268)*100 ≈ 24.6%, rounded to 25%.

questions.original_question: Three circles of radius 7 cm are kept touching each other. The string is tightly tied around these three circles. What is the length of the string?

english.explanation: The string forms an equilateral triangle (perimeter 3*14=42 cm) and three 120° arcs (total circumference of one circle: π*14 cm). Total length = 42 + 14π cm.

hindi.explanation: तीन वृत्त जिनकी त्रिज्या 7 सेमी है, एक-दूसरे को स्पर्श करते हैं। डोरी की लंबाई तीन वर्गों के एकरेखित भाग (प्रत्येक 14 सेमी) और तीन समान चापों के योग से मिलती है। चाप की लंबाई = 3*(60/360)*2π*7 = 7π सेमी। कुल लंबाई = 3*14 + 7π = 42 + 7π सेमी। विकल्प 1 सही है।

questions.original_question: A dealer marks his goods at 15% above the cost price and allows a discount of 5% for cash payment. His profit percentage is:

english.explanation: Let cost price be 100. Marked price = 115. After 5% discount, selling price = 115*0.95 = 109.25. Profit = 9.25%.

questions.original_question: What is the area of the curved surface of a right circular cone with height 8 m and slant height 10 m?

options.value: 60&pi;&nbsp;<span style="">m</span><span style=" line-height: 0; position: relative; vertical-align: baseline; top: -0.5em; font-size:10.5px;">2</span>
40&nbsp;<span style="">m</span><span style=" line-height: 0; position: relative; vertical-align: baseline; top: -0.5em; font-size:10.5px;">2</span>
40&pi;&nbsp;<span style="">m</span><span style=" line-height: 0; position: relative; vertical-align: baseline; top: -0.5em; font-size:10.5px;">2</span>

english.explanation: Curved surface area of a cone is πrl. Given slant height l=10m, radius r=6m (since r² +8²=10²). Area = π*6*10 = 60π m².

hindi.explanation: शंकु की तिर्यक ऊँचाई (l) = 10 मीटर, त्रिज्या (r) = 8 मीटर। वक्र पृष्ठीय क्षेत्रफल = πrl = π*8*10 = 80π m²। दिए गए विकल्पों में यह नहीं है, लेकिन सही उत्तर 80π होगा।

questions.original_question: In&nbsp;&Delta;ABC, P and Q are points on AB and BC, respectively, such that PQ&nbsp;∥ AC. Given that AB = 26, PQ = 7 and AC = 10 find the value of AP.

english.explanation: By Thales’ theorem, AP/AB = PQ/AC. AP = (7/10)*26 = 18.2.

hindi.explanation: PQ || AC के कारण, ∆APQ ~ ∆ABC होगा। अनुपात PQ/AC = AP/AB → 7/10 = AP/26 → AP = (7*26)/10 = 18.2। विकल्प 3 सही है।

questions.original_question: A shopkeeper advertises for selling cloth at 7% loss. However, by using a false scale of length 1 metre he actually gains 24%. What will be the actual length he uses instead of 1 metre ?

english.explanation: Let actual length be x. Selling at 7% loss but gaining 24%: (0.93/100)*x = 1.24. Solving gives x = 75 cm.

hindi.explanation: माना झूठा पैमाना x सेमी है। 7% हानि पर विक्रय मूल्य = 0.93 CP, लेकिन वास्तविक विक्रय मूल्य = (1/1.24) * 0.93 CP → x = 75 cm। विकल्प 1 सही है।

questions.original_question: A 100 ml solution of H<sub>2</sub>SO<sub>4</sub> having concentration of 20% is mixed with a 50% concentrated x ml mixture such that the net mixture is 30% concentrated. Determine x.

english.explanation: Using mixture equation: 20*100 + 50x = 30(100 + x). Solving gives x = 50 ml.
Using coordinate geometry and vector analysis, angle MDC is calculated as 75°.

hindi.explanation: वर्ग और समबाहु त्रिभुज के गुणों के आधार पर कोण की गणना करने पर ∠MDC = 75° होगा। विकल्प 4 सही है।

questions.original_question: Ten men begin to do a work. But after some days, four of them left the job. As a result, the job that could have been completed in 40 days is completed in 50 days. How many days after the commencement of the work did the four men leave?

english.explanation: Total work = 10*40 = 400. Let x days be worked by 10 men. 10x + 6(50 -x) = 400 → x=25.

hindi.explanation: माना 4 आदमी x दिन बाद छोड़ गए। काम का कुल मात्रा = 10*40 = 400 आदमी-दिन। 10x + 6(50 - x) = 400 → x = 35। विकल्प 3 सही है।

questions.original_question: If A + B = C, then tan A tan B tan C = ?

options.value: tan C + tan A - tan B
tan C + tan A + tan B
tan A - tan B - tan C
tan C - tan A - tan B

english.correct_answer: 4. tan C - tan A - tan B
english.explanation: Using tan(A + B) = tan C and rearranging gives tan A tan B tan C = tan C - tan A - tan B.

hindi.correct_answer: 4. tan C - tan A - tan B
hindi.explanation: यदि A + B = C, तो tan(A + B) = tan C। सूत्र के आधार पर tan A tan B tan C = tan C - tan A - tan B होता है। विकल्प 4 सही है।

questions.original_question: If m and n are two positive real numbers such that 9m<sup>2</sup>&nbsp;+ n<sup>2</sup>&nbsp;= 40 and mn = 4, then the value of 3m + n is:

english.explanation: Square 3m + n: (3m + n)² = 9m² + n² + 6mn = 40 + 24 = 64 → 3m + n = 8.

hindi.explanation: 3m + n का मान ज्ञात करने के लिए, (3m + n)² = 9m² + 6mn + n² = 40 + 24 = 64 → 3m + n = 8। विकल्प 4 सही है।

questions.original_question: The factors of x<sup>2</sup>&nbsp;+&nbsp;4y<sup>2</sup>&nbsp;+ 4y - 4xy - 2x - 8 are:

options.value: <span style=""><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">(</font></font>x<sup><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">2</font></font></sup><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"> - 2y - 4) (</font></font>x</span><sup><span style=" line-height: 0; position: relative; vertical-align: baseline; top: -0.5em; font-size:10.5px;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">2</font></span></sup><span style=""><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">&nbsp; + 2y + 2)</font></font></span>

english.explanation: Rewrite the expression as x² - 4xy + 4y² - 2x + 4y - 8. Recognize (x - 2y)² for the first three terms. Then factor the remaining terms: -2(x - 2y + 4). Substitute u = x - 2y to factor u² - 2(u + 4) = (u - 4)(u + 2). Substituting back gives (x - 2y - 4)(x - 2y + 2).

hindi.explanation: दिए गए व्यंजक को x² + 4y² +4y -4xy -2x -8 के रूप में लिखा जा सकता है। इसे पुनर्व्यवस्थित करके (x² -4xy +4y²) -2x +4y -8 के रूप में लिखें। पहले तीन पद (x-2y)² हैं। शेष पद -2x +4y -8 को -2(x-2y) -8 के रूप में लिखें। इस प्रकार व्यंजक (x-2y)² -2(x-2y) -8 हो जाता है। धारणा z = x-2y लेने पर, z² -2z -8 = (z+2)(z-4) होता है। प्रतिस्थापित करने पर (x-2y+2)(x-2y-4) प्राप्त होता है, जो विकल्प 1 में दिया गया है।

questions.original_question: The HCF of three numbers 105, 335 and 465 will be:

english.explanation: Factor each number: 105 = 3×5×7, 335 = 5×67, 465 = 5×3×31. The highest common factor is 5.

hindi.explanation: 105, 335, 465 का महत्तम समापवर्तक ज्ञात करने के लिए, पहले 105 और 335 का म.स. ज्ञात करें। 105 = 3×5×7, 335 = 5×67, इनका म.स. 5 है। फिर 5 और 465 का म.स. ज्ञात करें। 465 = 5×93, इसलिए म.स. 5 ही रहेगा।

questions.original_question: A number when divided by 221, leaves a remainder 30. If the same number is divided by 13, the remainder will be:

english.explanation: Let N = 221k + 30. When divided by 13, 221 is divisible by 13 (221 ÷ 13 = 17). So N = 13×17k + 30. The remainder is 30 mod 13 = 4.

hindi.explanation: माना संख्या N है। N = 221k +30। 221 = 13×17, इसलिए N को 13 से विभाजित करने पर शेषफल 30 को 13 से विभाजित करने पर प्राप्त होता है। 30 ÷ 13 का शेषफल 4 है।

questions.original_question: In an election between two candidates, a candidate who gets 76 % of the total votes polled is elected by a majority of 1480 votes. What is the total number of votes polled? (Consider integral part only)&nbsp;

english.explanation: Let total votes = x. Winning candidate: 0.76x, losing: 0.24x. Majority = 0.52x = 1480 → x = 1480 / 0.52 ≈ 2846.15 → Integral part is 2846.

questions.original_question: If x = 8(sin&nbsp;&theta; + cos&nbsp;&theta;) and y = 9(sin&nbsp;&theta; - cos&nbsp;&theta;), then the value of&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\({x^2 \over 8^2} + {y^2 \over 9^2}\)</span>&nbsp;is:

english.explanation: Compute x²/64 + y²/81 = (sinθ + cosθ)² + (sinθ - cosθ)² = 1 + sin2θ + 1 - sin2θ = 2.

hindi.explanation: x = 8(sinθ + cosθ), y = 9(sinθ - cosθ)। x²/64 + y²/81 = (64(sin²θ + 2sinθcosθ + cos²θ))/64 + (81(sin²θ - 2sinθcosθ + cos²θ))/81 = (1 + 2sinθcosθ) + (1 - 2sinθcosθ) = 2।

questions.original_question: AB is the diameter of a circle with centre O. If P be point on the circle such that&nbsp;&ang;AOP = 110&deg;, then the measure of&nbsp;&ang;OBP is:

options.value: <font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">65 </font></font><span style=""><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">&deg;</font></font></span>

<font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">60 </font></font><span style=""><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">&deg;</font></font></span>

<font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">55 </font></font><span style=""><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">&deg;</font></font></span>

english.explanation: ∠AOP = 110°, so ∠POB = 70°. In isosceles triangle OBP (∠OPB = ∠OBP), angles sum to 180° → ∠OBP = (180° - 70°)/2 = 55°.

questions.original_question: A is chasing B in the same interval of time. A jumps 8 times, while B jumps 6 times. But the distance covered by A in 7 jumps is the same as that of B in 5 jumps. The ratio between the speeds of A and B is ________.&nbsp;

options.value: <font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">30 </font></font><span style=""><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">&nbsp;∶&nbsp;</font></font></span><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"> 56</font></font>

<font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">20 </font></font><span style=""><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">&nbsp;∶&nbsp;</font></font></span><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"> 21</font></font>

<font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">28 </font></font><span style=""><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">&nbsp;∶&nbsp;</font></font></span><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"> 36</font></font>

english.explanation: Speed ratio = (Jumps of A × Jump length of A) / (Jumps of B × Jump length of B). Given 7La = 5Lb → La/Lb = 5/7. Speed ratio = (8×5)/(6×7) = 40/42 = 20/21.

questions.original_question: In a certain duration of time, a sum become 2 times itself at the rate of 5% per annum simple interest. What will be the rate of interest if the same sum becomes 5 times itself in the same duration?&nbsp;

english.explanation: Time to double: T = (P × 100)/(P × 5) = 20 years. For quintuple: 4P = (P × 20 × R)/100 → R = 20%.

hindi.explanation: समान समय में दुगुनी होने पर: 2P = P + P×5%×t → t = 20 वर्ष। 5P = P + P×r×20 → r = 20%।

questions.original_question: A mixture contains milk and water in the ratio of 5&nbsp;∶ 3, respectively. On adding 7 litres of water, the ratio of milk to water becomes 1<span style="">&nbsp;∶&nbsp;</span>2. Find the quantity of milk in the mixture.&nbsp;

english.explanation: Let milk = 5x, water = 3x. After adding 7L water: 5x/(3x + 7) = 1/2 → 10x = 3x + 7 → x = 1. Milk = 5x = 5L.

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the INCORRECTLY spelt word in the following sentence.</p>

<p>The outcome of the survey was a critical intervention to the questionaire prepared by Suraj and his committee.</p>

english.explanation: The word 'questionaire' is misspelled. The correct spelling is 'questionnaire', which refers to a set of questions. The other words in the sentence (outcome, intervention, committee) are spelled correctly.

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the correct active form of the given sentence.</p>

<p>A terrible disaster was witnessed by our country.&nbsp;</p>

options.value: Our country had witnessed a terrible disaster.
Our country is witnessing a terrible disaster.&nbsp;
Our country witnessed a terrible disaster.&nbsp;
Our country witnesses a terrible disaster.

english.correct_answer: 3. Our country witnessed a terrible disaster.
english.explanation: The passive sentence 'A terrible disaster was witnessed by our country' is converted to active voice by making 'our country' the subject. The correct active form is 'Our country witnessed a terrible disaster.' The other options use incorrect tenses (past perfect, present continuous, or present simple) that do not match the original sentence's meaning.

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option that can be used as a one-word substitute for the given group of words/phrase.</p>

<p>Fail to notice; ignore; condone (an offence etc.)</p>

english.explanation: 'Overlook' means to neglect, ignore, or fail to notice something, which matches the definition of 'Fail to notice; ignore; condone (an offence etc.)'. The other options are unrelated: 'Overlong' means too long, 'Overlie' means to cover, and 'Overly' means excessively.

questions.original_question:
<p>The following sentence has been divided into parts. One of them may contain an error. Select the part that contains the error from the given options. If you don&rsquo;t find any error, mark &lsquo;No error&rsquo; as your answer.</p>

<p>He knows that / he has no other option / but to work hard.&nbsp;</p>

english.explanation: The sentence 'He knows that he has no other option but to work hard' is grammatically correct. The structure 'has no other option but to work hard' is a standard construction with no errors in any part.

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the most appropriate meaning of the given idiom.</p>

<p>Cudgel one&rsquo;s brain</p>

english.explanation: The idiom 'Cudgel one’s brain' means to think deeply or with great effort. Option 2 directly captures this meaning, while the other options are either too vague or incorrect.

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the most appropriate option that can substitute the underlined segment in the given sentence. If there is no need to substitute it, select &lsquo;No substitution&rsquo;.</p>

<p>When I was of your age, I was working two jobs <u>to provide for</u> my family.</p>

english.explanation: The phrase 'to provide for' is correctly used in the sentence. It means to supply necessities, and no substitution is needed. The other options (e.g., 'to providing for') are grammatically incorrect.

questions.original_question: <strong>Select the sentences that contains no spelling errors.&nbsp;</strong>

options.value: The hippoputamus, also known as &lsquo;river horse&rsquo;, lives throughout sub Saharan Africa.&nbsp;
The hipopotamus, also known as &lsquo;river horse&rsquo;, lives throughout sub Saharan Africa.
The hippopotmaus, also known as &lsquo;river horse&rsquo;, lives throughout sub Saharan Africa.&nbsp;
The hippopotamus, also known as &lsquo;river horse&rsquo;, lives throughout sub Saharan Africa.

english.correct_answer: 4. The hippopotamus, also known as ‘river horse’, lives throughout sub Saharan Africa.
english.explanation: Option 4 spells 'hippopotamus' correctly. The other options contain misspellings such as 'hippoputamus', 'hipopotamus', and 'hippopotmaus'.

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the most appropriate ANTONYM of the given word.</p>

<p>Bulk</p>

english.explanation: 'Handful' is the antonym of 'Bulk', as 'Bulk' refers to a large quantity, while 'Handful' refers to a small amount. The other options are unrelated to the antonym relationship.

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the most appropriate option to fill in the blank.</p>

<p>She frankly confessed that she couldn&rsquo;t ________&nbsp;to purchase a car then.</p>

english.explanation: The correct word is 'afford', as the sentence implies an inability to economically purchase a car. 'Spend', 'stand', and 'tolerate' do not fit the context.

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the most appropriate ANTONYM of the underlined word.</p>

<p>The natural environment is in contrast with the &#39;built environment&#39; which refers to areas that have been fundamentally transformed and <u>influenced </u>by human activity, such as cities, towns, substructures and so on.</p>

english.explanation: The antonym of 'influenced' in this context is 'uninfluenced' (not affected by human activity). While 'Fair' does not directly mean this, it is the closest option provided, though the question may have intended a different answer. However, based on the given choices, 'Fair' is the most neutral and contextually plausible.

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the correct indirect form of the given sentence.</p>

<p>The blind man said to me, &ldquo;Can you help me cross the road?&rdquo;</p>

options.value: The blind man asked me if I could help him cross the road.
The blind man asked me if I will help him cross the road.
The blind man asked me if I could help him crossed the road.
The blind man asked me if I can help him cross the road.&nbsp;

english.correct_answer: 1. The blind man asked me if I could help him cross the road.
english.explanation: The indirect form correctly converts the past tense of the question ('Can you help me...') to 'could' in the reported clause. Other options use incorrect tenses or pronouns (e.g., 'will', 'crossed').

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the most appropriate option to fill in the blank.</p>

<p>One has to be persistent in studies if he/she wants to get his/her dream job. Success will remain unattainable if one studies ________.&nbsp;</p>

english.explanation: 'By fits and starts' means in an irregular or inconsistent manner, which fits the context of 'unattainable success' when studying inconsistently. The other options are either unrelated or incorrect idioms.

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option that can be used as a one-word substitute for the given group of words.</p>

<p>A room where dead bodies are kept until burial</p>

english.explanation: 'Mortuary' is a room where dead bodies are stored before burial. The other options refer to different places: 'Sanatorium' for health treatment, 'Museum' for exhibits, and 'Safari' for wildlife exploration.

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option that expresses the given sentence in active voice.</p>

<p>The important points were narrated in the class by the teacher.</p>

options.value: The teacher was narrating important points in the class.
The teacher had narrated the important points in the class.&nbsp;
The teacher narrated the important points in the class.
In the class, the important points were narrated.

english.correct_answer: 3. The teacher narrated the important points in the class.
english.explanation: The active voice version of the passive sentence is correct here. The subject (teacher) performs the action (narrated) directly. Other options use incorrect tenses or passive structures.

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the most appropriate option to fill in the blank.</p>

<p>She became frustrated with her poor health and began to lose ________ of her recovery</p>

english.explanation: The sentence implies a loss of belief in eventual recovery, making 'hope' the correct word. The other options (weight, idea, money) do not fit the context.

questions.original_question:
<p>The following sentence has been split into four segments. Identify the segment that contains a grammatical error.</p>

<p>She has / a habit of / spending against / her means.</p>

english.explanation: The phrase 'spend against one's means' is incorrect. The correct expression is 'spend beyond one's means,' which means to spend more money than one has available. 'Against' is not the correct preposition here.

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option that can be used as a one-word substitute for the given group of words.</p>

<p>The action of damaging the good reputation of someone</p>

english.explanation: Defamation refers to the act of damaging someone's reputation, either by making false statements (slander) or written false statements (libel). The other options do not fit: Delegate is assigning a task, Degeneration is decline, and Defection is switching allegiance.

The correct order is: Q (An eruption of the volcano Anak Krakatau) → P (caused a landslide that) → R (triggered a tsunami in the Sunda Strait) → S (and killed more than 400 people). This sequence logically connects the cause (volcanic eruption), effect (landslide), and consequence (tsunami and deaths).

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the most appropriate ANTONYM of the given word.</p>

<p>Loyal</p>

english.explanation: Fickle means likely to change or not faithful, which is the direct antonym of 'Loyal.' Ardent means passionate, Stupid means lacking intelligence, and Tragic refers to a sad event.

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the most appropriate ANTONYM of the underlined word.</p>

<p>The dacoits <u>ravaged</u> the bungalow in the absence of its owner.&nbsp;</p>

english.explanation: Ravaged means destroyed or damaged. Restored is the antonym, meaning to return something to its original condition. Exploded, Demolished, and Sealed do not logically oppose 'ravaged.'

questions.original_question: Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank number 1.&nbsp;
Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank number 2.&nbsp;
Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank number 3.
Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank number 4.&nbsp;
Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank number 5.
